thread.title: Doggett Concrete Construction Hires Mike Wallberg as Commercial Concrete Field Manager

author: cnbc.com
title: Doggett Concrete Construction Hires Mike Wallberg as Commercial Concrete Field Manager

organizations.name: doggett concrete construction doggett concrete construction

text:
CHARLOTTE, N.C., May 3, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Mike Wallberg has joined the Doggett Concrete Construction team as a field manager for our commercial concrete division. Mike brings a wealth of experience and expertise to Doggett, and as a former owner of a construction company, he is well versed in the industry and will be an asset to our growing team.
"I'm excited to be joining a company where I can work alongside people I have known and subbed for the past 20 years," says Mike. "The industry is such an exciting one, and I enjoy seeing new results every day as projects are constantly progressing."
Mike will be managing a portion of our commercial crews and will ensure projects are complete to expectations.
"It is great to have Mike on board with the team," says Vice President, Cletus Haas. "I have known Mike for over 20 years, and he has done quality work for us as a subcontractor in the past. Mike brings in a lot of experience in the concrete foundation business."
ABOUT DOGGETT CONCRETE CONSTRUCTION
Doggett Concrete Construction is a Commercial and Residential Concrete Construction Company, proudly serving Charlotte, NC and the surrounding area since 1963. For further information about Doggett Concrete Construction, please visit www.doggettconcrete.com
Follow Doggett Concrete Construction on Linkedin , Instagram , and Facebook
Media Contact: Jennifer Watson, jwatson@moistureloc.com
